texts: OGE Next is being updated to the latest version.
OGE Next allows you to access your school's online gradebook and average from OGE..
A motivational message is placed above each semester to help you stay motivated and focused on your studies.
OGE Next exists because OGE doesn't provide any average calculation feature before the very end of the semester.
You can choose how often OGE Next checks for updates in the settings.

downloadFailed.title: Download Failed
downloadFailed.text: An error occurred while downloading the update.

installFailed.title: Install Failed
installFailed.text: An error occurred while installing the update.

openAppFailed.title: Open App Failed
openAppFailed.text: An error occurred while opening the app.
